data.description: Experience the convenience and charm of this move-in ready, Country-style residence. Step onto the delightful rocking chair front porch, where you can savor your morning coffee and embrace the tranquility of this peaceful neighborhood. The expansive family room features an exquisite stone masonry fireplace, complemented by custom shelving on each side and contemporary recessed lighting. On the main floor, the spacious Master bedroom awaits, complete with a luxurious ensuite bath adorned with granite countertops. The efficient kitchen boasts matching granite countertops, a stainless steel dishwasher, and stove. The remaining half-acre of the property invites you to revel in the fully fenced backyard, perfect for entertaining guests. Enjoy the expansive back deck and your personal 25' x 20' basketball court. Upstairs, discover two generously-sized secondary bedrooms with vaulted ceilings, a well-appointed full bath nestled between them, and stunning hardwood floors throughout. This low-maintenance home offers a 5-year-old roof, a 3-year-old water heater, and a recently serviced HVAC system. Furthermore, the Riverdale Skatepark is conveniently located just half a mile away, while the Riverdale Town Center is a mere 3-minute drive from your doorstep. Don't miss the opportunity to make this remarkable home yours, as it won't be available for long.
